title: LFT Total Newb Melb Aust
body:
Hey,

I'm from Melbourne, Australia. I just started playing a few days ago. I think I could get better a lot fast as part of a team. I like to jungle and gank or carry bottom but would be happy to play any position you feel is best. I main (if you could say that this early) Warwick and Alt Ashe if I want to carry bottom. I'm free to play anytime at this point but may eventually be able only able to play 6pm - Late AusEST in a few months time. I'm a pretty quick learner and have a mic for ventrilo or whatever people use these days. My in-game name is ultravioletfury feel free to friend me or whatever.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/50EsaJ4i-lft-pool-party-event-unranked-new-players-wanted
Would you be open to teaming up for the Pool Party Event? I live in Western Australia, so I can play at about the same times as you. Lmk :]
Yeah I dont know what that is but I'd love too.
